metadata.title: CVE-2022-47185 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Improper input validation vulnerability on the range header in ApacheSoftware Foundation Apache Traffic Server.This issue affects Apache TrafficServer: through 9.2.1.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-47185` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

trafficserver - 9.2.4+ds-2
trafficserver-experimental-plugins - 9.2.4+ds-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: trafficserver package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.2.4+ds-2').
